flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: This costume is entirely homemade.  The mask is paper mache and acrylic paint!!  My son found this old Nintendo 64 game character online and wanted me to make it for Halloween so here it is!!!
guide.title: Skull Kid w/ Majora's Mask - Halloween Costume 2011
